website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost, sturdy cot with several benefits and a few known flaws.
pros: Length (77 inches) is better for taller people

customer_reviews.title: This cot is hard to put together, I used ...
customer_reviews.text: This cot is hard to put together, I used it once. I do understand that being new and all the canvas needs a little breaking in. However you do literally need a crow bar to put the end piece on. Too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great service and product!
customer_reviews.text: We received the cot quickly. Extremely easy to set up. The zipper on the case was broken, but a replacement was sent out as soon as I notified them. I was impressed at how quickly and hassel free they responded and replaced the faulty part. This is the 2nd cot I have purchased. Very comfortable for our annual week long camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: cntryrose26

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought one many years ago and I still have it. We needed another cot so we bought another on of these.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Burgess

customer_reviews.title: This is for lightweights only
customer_reviews.text: Hauled this cart all the way to central america with plans to leave it for future trips. Had to haul it right back after it broke within five minutes. The bend of the legs make it susceptible to breakage. The design makes it difficult to enter and exit without placing weight on corners. However all corners are mark as "no touch" zones. Purchase at your own risk!!!! I sent this one back and purchased one from Cabelas.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Butler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easily set up.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 200 pounds and 5'5 and found this cot perfect for me. Easy to set up and take down Fits nicely in a bag for easy storage. A burly person might want to go with the XXL size. Pay attention to the dimensions of the cot. We had to buy a bigger tent to accommodate our two cots. Amazon had the best price and free shipping with only a 4 day wait for it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Marty from Boise

customer_reviews.title: cot
customer_reviews.text: Great nice height and with and lnght but I do need alittle more padding with it very study and stable
customer_reviews.author: SHERI C

customer_reviews.title: It's still a cot....Needs cushioning for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: It folds up small enough for storage when not in use. Travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Dian Flormann

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: It worked great...until it broke. I used it 3 times, then it broke. NOT FOR FAT PEOPLE!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: a good cot
customer_reviews.text: 6'3" and 237 pounds. With a good cushion this cot was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than sleeping on the ground. Lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Hack88

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice to be up off the ground.
customer_reviews.text: This requires some strength to setup when brand new. I assume the canvas will stretch slightly over time so they make it extra tight when new. It works great and sleeps fine. As I have aged I found getting up from the ground harder and harder. These are so much nicer!
customer_reviews.author: SD Abingdon, MD

customer_reviews.title: Cot VS Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these cots and they broke on the first time out. Amazon replaced them. The second set also broke on their first time out; Amazon would no longer help me. I contacted Earth, the manufacturer, and was given the best and most prompt service I have ever received in my lifetime. Although the cot is not for me, I definitely will be shopping with them in the future and hope that all of you do as well. They no longer are selling this particular cot but they have one that is built stronger and better as well as have lots of wonderful merchandise just waiting for you to purchase. Thank you Earth...
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Earth Cot
customer_reviews.text: Brough two of this and also brough two cheaper one from a different place. Should have buy four of the better one. The cheaper one is already fallen apart and this two is still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hom

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I just got it and haven't yet had an opportunity to use it. I'll post again with a comprehensive review. It arrived quickly and appears to be a very sturdy product. Setup was a snap and I'm "just a girl". I love how big it is. Compact storage is another plus. Unlike an air mattress I won't have to worry about it being cold or losing air in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: MT

product_meta.title: Earth X-Tra Big Military Style Cot
product_meta.description: BIG on size, BIG on comfort! This Earth X-TRA BIG "Military Style" COT fits even the Biggest of Guys! Big enough to move around for an even Better Night's Sleep!
feature_bullets: Extra Big- Extra Wide- Extra Tall- Extra Strong
SLEEP BETTER, More Room to Sleep
TALLER, easy to Enter & Exit (19“ off ground)
